name: 陳凱瀛
objective:
協助學員在完成課程後：
1. 對於 TFT-LCD 的製程有基礎認識
2. 對於 TFT-LCD 機台設備及元件的設備原理、操作、保養有基礎概念
3. 智慧化生產技術於 TFT-LCD 製造業的應用概念
4. 學校所學理論於產業應用的創意發想
Students achieve the following learning outcomes upon completing the course:
1.Develop a fundamental understanding of the TFT-LCD manufacturing process.
2.Gain basic concepts of the design principles, operation, and maintenance of TFT-LCD machine equipment and components.
3.Understand the concept of applying intelligent production technology in the TFT-LCD manufacturing industry.
4.Generate creative ideas for applying theoretical knowledge learned in school to industry practices.
schedule:
week 1-6 TFT-LCD 的製程有基礎認識
week 7-12 TFT-LCD 機台設備及元件的設備原理、操作、保養
week 13-16 智慧化生產技術於 TFT-LCD 製造業的應用
week 17-18 產業應用的創意發想
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
